addon.name: Library - JS Breakpoints
addon.description: DEPENDENCY ADDON: Uses CSS breakpoints to apply attributes to HTML for Javascript to use, on the fly. Requires underscore/lodash. Found here.

item.name: Enable Addon?
item.tooltip: Allows you to enable/disable this addon on a per-store basis.

item.name: Allow Deferring?
item.tooltip: For maximum compatibility, do not let CS-Cart move (defer) this script into the footer. If you know there will be no compatibility isses, allow this for more performance.

item.name: Breakpoint Style
item.tooltip: Whether breakpoints should trigger based on min or max width.

item.name: Extra Large Breakpoint
item.tooltip: A breakpoint in px where the extra-large range is triggered. Example, 1024px.

item.name: Large Breakpoint
item.tooltip: A breakpoint in px where the large range is triggered. Example, 768px.

item.name: Medium Breakpoint
item.tooltip: A breakpoint in px where the medium range is triggered. Example, 640px.

item.name: Small Breakpoint
item.tooltip: A breakpoint in px where the small range is triggered. Example, 480px.

item.name: Tiny Breakpoint
item.tooltip: A breakpoint in px where the tiny range is triggered. Example, 320px.

item.name: Listener Wait
item.tooltip: The amount of milliseconds the UI should wait before looking for a new breakpoint. Example, 100.
